name: The Vasa Pirates
startIntroPart1: Hello Traveler, I hope you will not get in the way of the great Army of Pirates!
startIntroPart2: Commander I hope you will revive the great power of the pirates and conquer many lands for us.
attacked: You declared war on us, but you didn't defeat us.!
defeated: Come on, destroy me! pull the trigger!
introduction: Hello, tourist! I've killed people like you! If you don't want to die, don't come into our territory!
hateHello: We'll kill you sooner or later!
tradeRequest: How do you like this offer?
